name: Damien Pilat
headerTaglineThree: passionate about creating intuitive, accessible products.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: UX-focused Frontend Engineer with experience leading design direction from Figma prototypes to production-ready code. Skilled in creating intuitive, accessible interfaces and enhancing scalable design systems across AI-powered and data-rich products.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer, and maker.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

bullets: Led multiple initiatives building Figma prototypes, iterative development, and automated feature testing,
Contributed to Design System: adding better localisation support, resolving bugs, increasing accessibility,
Improved design consistency and delivery by introducing visual regression testing using Storybook & Chromatic,
Mentored new joiners and grads to aid in passing probation and upskilling in frontend.
Produced new chat-based AI workflow: from Figma wireframe, A/B testing, mid-fidelity prototype, implementa- tion, and user testing,
Conducted end-to-end UX Expert Evaluation, implemented 19 Vue.js enhancements and overseeing concurrent research projects,
Brought an iterative design and usability testing approach, from low to high fidelity prototypes,
Managed Mongo database security during cloud disruptions: reducing user impact, managing C-level expectations,
Integrated major patents databases through: implementing proximity, field specifiers, and boolean operator logic.

experiences.position: UX Engineer at Financial Conduct Authority (internship)
bullets: Adoption of metric-based insights and front-end development expertise to improve user experience and enhance features for a webscraping and vector graphing tool,
Added user requested features using VueJS and antdesign UI library.
Implemented UX best practices to enhance design continuity, accessibility, and modularity as a fullstack developer,
Regular live demonstrations to over 30 stakeholders bi-monthly, showcasing progress and receiving feedback,
Fullstack development for a multinational payroll SaaS solution supporting 2400 entities across 130+ countries.
Developed Feedback functionality using ReactJS, styled-components, and MaterialUI in an agile environment,
Ensured scalability through use of react-i18next, managed expectations for delivery in 7 days,
6 month User Experience Research & Design Project, creating 3 comprehensive and increasingly higher fidelity prototypes in Figma from results of 12+ participant study.

education.universityName: Columbia University in the City of New York
education.degree: Summer Program: Machine Learning & Social Psychology
